title: Een Nieuw Leven
description: Ten years after separating from his wife and children, Norbert's estranged son Matthijs turns up on his doorstep.

title: Rotte Appels
description: Norbert is called to meet with Matthijs' teacher to discuss his son's bad behavior at school. But father Hogendijk turns out to have some skeletons in his school locker himself.

title: Liefde is...
description: Matthijs brings home a pregnant punk girl and claims to be the father of her child.

title: Verdacht
description: Norbert thinks Matthijs should be more like clean cut neighbor Jan-Willem, especially when the police come round with accusations of theft and drugs.

title: Een Afspraakje
description: Norbert is dating a much younger woman he met at work. Naturally Matthijs and Suus want to find out all about her.

title: Klein Geld
description: Norbert finds that he is losing small change around the house, so he tells Matthijs to get a job.

title: Protest
description: Matthijs has become a vegetarian, joined a animal rights group and begins to brings home liberated lab animals.

title: Zoals Vroeger
description: Matthijs reminds Normert that it's his wedding anniversary. He has also invited his mother Tilly without his fathers consent, supposedly to get some of her old stuff back.

title: Favoriet
description: Norbert is in the running for a promotion. To make him even more nervous, Matthijs has taken a job as an intern at his father's firm.

title: Carrière!
description: When Norbert's successful younger brother Eduard comes to visit, Norbert begins to brag about his own living and working circumstances.

title: Plastic Droomwereld
description: Matthijs uses an inheritance to open a student bank account and just as his father feared, starts spending money left and right.

title: Feestje
description: Matthijs has been throwing parties whenever his father's away. Once he catches wind of this, Norbert decides to come home early and crash the party.

title: Amateurtoneel
description: When Matthijs practices a climactic scene from Othelo with his female teacher at home, Norbert can't refrain from giving his son some acting tips.

title: Burgerwacht
description: Norbert has had extra security installed and joined a neighborhood watch. When Matthijs offers a place to sleep to a dangerous looking fellow, he calls his fellow watchman Ronnie.

title: Geest-verschijning
description: Matthijs and Guusje have organized a séance to contact Pinky the dead cat. Because Norbert finds the entire issue laughable, he excepts a challenge to spend the night at a haunted railway station.

title: Henriëtte
description: Middle child Henriëtte comes to stay, seeking advice from her father. She quickly gets on Norbert's good side, but not so much on those of Matthijs and Suus.

title: Dorpspolitiek
description: Norbert is competing in the local elections as an independent candidate, but cannot count on Matthijs nor Suus' vote.

title: Dagje Ouder
description: Norbert is losing his hearing and may need to wear a hearing aid. Matthijs takes in a local no good elderly gent called Loetje.

title: Het Witte Bruggetje
description: Norbert's old flame Hannah is coming over from the States, so Matthijs offers his father a crash course to get his body back into shape.

title: De Ware
description: Matthijs brings home a girlfriend, Louise, but soon she begins to show more interest in his father.

title: Eindexamen
description: Matthijs exams are coming up and he is been telling so many lies at school all year that he and his pals are confident that they will easily get through every test by cheating.

title: Een Geintje
description: Thinking his son is playing a prank on him, Norbert manages to overpower a bank robber with one punch.

title: De Knokpartij
description: Matthijs is challenged to a fight by a jealous boyfriend. Norbert gives him some fighting tips.

title: Het Huwelijk
description: Suus is getting married to neighbor Ron.

title: Terugkeer naar Hollumerzand
description: Norbert insists on spending Easter in Hollumerzand and Matthijs reluctantly comes along. His attitude changes when he meets a girl called Tine.

title: De Advertentie
description: With Suus on an extended holiday, Norbert asks his son to place an ad for a new maid in the local paper. But while Norbert hires a reliable widow, Mathijs takes on an ex-circus artist.

title: Het Huis Uit
description: Matthijs is off to college and takes a room with fellow students Tony & René. But when his room turns out to be a broom closet he wants to move back home. However, his place in his father's house has already been taken by his younger sister Freddy.

title: Niet Mals
description: Now that Mathijs has moved out and Freddy in, she offers to clean and cook for Norbert. But Mathijs announces he's dropped out of school because of claustrophobia and wants his room back.

title: De behangers
description: Matthijs is living in a tent in the garden but wants to move into the garage. Suus has spent almost all of her inheritance and has bought a house nearby. Matthijs and his pal Sjuul start a lucrative business as wallpaper men. But Norbert panics when the wallpaper turns out to be stolen and Freddy happens to be dating a policeman.

title: In je mand
description: Matthijs brings an old chair invested by woodworm into the house, as well as a snake in a basket that he promised to look after for a girlfriend.

title: Wie volgt...?
description: Norbert falls in love with Freddy's teacher Hannie. But Matthijs becomes suspicious when he learns the woman is a four time widow.

title: De Klusjesman
description: When Norbert hires a handyman called Mans to fix the kitchen sink rather than Matthijs' friend Sjuul, the family almost ends up having to move out.

title: Heerlijk Avondje
description: Norbert doesn't want anybody to enter his expensive new kitchen. Matthijs is aiming to win a competition to play the local Sinterklaas. He a gets former Sint, thespian Albert Paardekoper, to coach him.

title: Shampoo
description: Matthijs has agreed to be a guinea pig and test a new shampoo, XY2002. But he chickens out at the last minute and tricks his father (and inadvertently his sister) into using the shampoo, just before they go to a fancy diner at the French embassy.

title: Vakantiewerk
description: Matthijs & Freddy apply for a summer job at the same restaurant. He as a waiter and she as dishwasher. But Freddy soon manages to climb up to the position of assistant manager. Her first task: to fire her brother.

title: De Afspraak
description: Norbert will allow Matthijs & Freddy to throw a party, on the condition they are nice to each other for an entire week.

title: Krijt op tijd
description: Norbert is challenged to break a record at his local snooker club, so Matthijs becomes his coach. But things go wrong when Norbert tries a miracle drug from the Amazon rain forest his son has been raving about.

title: Buslijn Begeerte
description: A bus stop has temporarily been placed right in front of the Hogendoorn house. While Norbert tries to get it removed as soon as possible, Matthijs sees it as a quick and easy way to make some money.

title: De Verbouwing
description: While Norbert is on a business trip to Belgium, his house is being redecorated. Freddy decides to put in some new furniture on loan and Matthijs falls for the young female truck driver, Renske.

title: Videocamera
description: Norbert has to make video recording of his boss at work. Matthijs, who fancies a career in showbiz, takes this task very seriously. But then the Hogendijk house is burgled and the camera stolen.

title: Lang zal ie leven
description: Freddy and Matthijs want to surprise their father with a special breakfast for his birthday. They get dirty old Louis to play a butler, Matthijs manages to score some cheap caviar and there is even a Russian violinist.

title: Lot uit de loterij
description: When an attractive nurse comes round to sell lottery tickets, both Matthijs and Norbert take a liking to her. This despite the fact that she is too old for the son and too young for the father.

title: Tante Sophie
description: Norbert is angry at Matthijs for abruptly quitting his study, so the boy moves in with Suus. But when aunt Sophie and her little dog come to stay with Norbert and Freddy, they end up begging Matthijs to come home.

title: Love Advice Company
description: Freddy throws a costume party and has also invited her mother Tilly. Meanwhile Norbert seeks love advice from his son because he's in love with his much younger secretary Brechtje.

title: Collega's
description: Norbert is losing contact with some colleagues because of reorganizations at work. Freddy suggests he starts a dinner club. When it's his turn to cook on their first meeting, he asks Freddy to do all the hard work in the kitchen.

title: In de klem
description: Freddy is working at a hotel as an intern and Matthijs as a runner at Glamour Studios. Norbert is forced to begin working part time on account of further reorganizations at the ministry. He is too ashamed to tell his children.

title: Sterallures
description: While working as a runner thanks to his mother, Mathijs becomes starstruck after getting to appear as an extra. Meanwhile Freddy is asked to be the on-set caterer.

title: De Storm
description: Freddy has had enough of Norbert & Matthijs eating from her snacks, so her mother helps her to play a trick on them. This leads to Norbert catching a cold.

title: De Staking
description: When Norbert comes down with a cold, his ex-wife Tilly comes round to look after him. This annoys Suus so much, she ends up going on strike and locking herself in the bathroom.

title: Blij dat ik rij
description: Mathijs' driving exam is jeopardized by ducks on the road. Freddy has acquired a small van of her own for her catering business.

title: Reisgezelschap
description: Norbert has received a trip for two of his choosing as a parting gift from the Ministry. His children decide to place an add seeking a suitable traveling companion for their father.
